name: Brigitte Doege
biography: Brigitte Doege studied at the Akademie der Bildenden Künste München (Academy of Fine Arts in Munich), where she majored in product design and painting. After graduation Doege worked as a freelance designer, color consultant, and painter. She also began teaching at the Blocher School in Munich, the Academy Faber-Castell in Nuremberg, and the University of Rosenheim. In 1985 Dodge designed a porcelain collection for Rosenthal. Her works have been exhibited internationally, including at the Haus der Kunst in Munich as well as a galleries in New York and Tokyo. She currently lives and works in Gauting, Germany.
